title: 51: OBITCH eat it up!
description:
Oh bitch…you’re in for a treat this week because we’re serving up some delicious funerary delicacies, and then coming in hot with some truly ironic deaths. We’ve got an obituary for an obituary fanatic, one for a gal who loved to talk shit, and of course, we’ve got some dumb.ass.criminalllllllls! 



SEE US LIVE IN IRVINE ON AUGUST 4TH: https://tinyurl.com/3fvwbsnz



Follow along online: @obitchuarypod on Twitter & Instagram. 


Write to us: obitpod@gmail.com


Spencer Henry & Madison Reyes

PO Box 18149 Long Beach, CA 90807


Get a cameo from us: https://www.cameo.com/obitchuarypodcast


Funeral Potato Recipe: https://tastesbetterfromscratch.com/funeral-potatoes/



Sources:


https://worldnewsdailyreport.com/burglar-snorts-dried-sperm-thinking-it-was-cocaine-contracts-herpes-and-syphilis/

https://www.shiva.com/learning-center/sitting-shiva/first-meal/

https://www.funeralguide.com/blog/funeral-foodhttps://www.smithsonianmag.com/travel/meaning-behind-six-objects-dia-de-los-muertos-altars-180973442/

https://www.southernliving.com/recipes/shout-hallelujah-potato-salad

https://www.thevintagenews.com/2018/06/07/mithridates-vi/?safari=1

https://www.smithsonianmag.com/arts-culture/testing-for-poison-still-a-profession-for-some-61805292/

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Máel_Brigte_of_Moray

https://sofrep.com/news/viking-named-sigurd-the-mighty-was-killed-in-a-less-mighty-way/

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Aeschylus

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Demeter

https://renaissance-well-beings.com/2022/01/27/aeschylus-death-a-genuine-tragedy-or-murder-cover-up/

https://www.businessinsider.com/when-americans-went-to-war-against-seat-belts-2020-5

https://www.grunge.com/622954/the-anti-seatbelt-movement-explained/

https://www.dailynebraskan.com/derek-kieper-individual-rights-buckle-under-seat-belt-laws/article_76ccbd44-86bc-5380-bb25-f10cdebb5698.html

https://www.nbcnews.com/news/us-news/pet-duck-leads-police-body-missing-woman-granddaughter-charged-murder-rcna26071

https://www.legacy.com/us/obituaries/name/ellen-turner-obituary?id=33778169

https://www.knowyournews.com/posts/elderly-woman-steals-jacket-from-picasso-museum
